directions: Mix dry Idahoan mashed potatoes with salsa, chilies and sour cream.
Let stand at room temperature for 15 minutes before serving.
Garnish with cilantro and black olives. Serve with corn chips.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) package Idahoan® Bacon & Cheddar Chipotle Flavored Mashed Potatoes
1 (16 ounce) jar HERDEZ® Casera medium salsa
1 (4 ounce) can mild chopped green chilies
title: Fiesta Dip from Idahoan®
